description: The new Heavyweight Drop Line Jacket will be your new cozy companion to check off all your chilly weather to-dos, inside and out of the house, or the city limits. This sweater fleece breathes easy from pre-work espresso runs to post-work dog walks and sunset hikes. You can even comfortably layer this versatile fleece under your ski jacket or rain shell for winter resort laps and cold, wet commutes thanks to chafe-reducing flat-locked seams. When the weekend arrives, pull it over your classy cocktail attire or brewery-casual garb to add some warm cozyness to your nights out on the town.
name: Marmot Heavyweight Drop Line Printed 1/2 Zip - Mens
